snippet: Also, do more attractive members of Congress get more press attention? And are there attractive members of Congress?
abstract: Also, do more attractive members of Congress get more press attention? And are there attractive members of Congress?
lead_paragraph: The Nook, the Barnes & Noble e-reader, has sold well and drawn praise from reviewers, but has yet to make a profit. It is a tricky situation, with investors anxious about the future costs tied to the product and the company convinced that investments of as much $200 million to $250 million a year will pay dividends, DealBook reports. The company is considering a way out by spinning off the Nook division.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Spin Off the Nook to Save It? Ab/Fab and Van Halen Return
